channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: General flytip crap, 19th January
item.description:
Wooden cupboards cardboard plastic items and household items dumped. This has been here since before Christmas!! Caretaker and cleaner non existent, no reporting of waste and no sign of char vehicle that’s is meant to clear this crap for months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckway Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing green recycling bin since last week's rubbish collection, 19th January
item.description:
The green recycling bin from 167B Hither Green Lane has been missing since rubbish was collected on the morning of Thursday 15th Jan. No sign of the bin being taken by mistake at anyone else's house, and it has not been returned
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 134, Hither Green Lane, Hither Green, Greater London

item.title: The lights arent working in Lordship road N16 5HG, 19th January
item.description:
